snippet: Mary Carillo’s work as a sports analyst and reporter has taken her around the world, but New York still beckons her.
abstract: Sports analyst and reporter Mary Carillo loves her one-bedroom co-op in Manhattan's West Village, which she calls her 'bowling alley' apartment because of its long, skinny configuration.
lead_paragraph: Mary Carillo’s work as a sports analyst and reporter has taken her around the world, but New York still beckons her.

headline.seo: Mary Carillo: At Home in the West Village
